original_text: Neither shall they take for their wives a widow, nor her that is put away: but they shall take maidens of the seed of the house of Israel, or a widow that had a priest before.
korean_text: 과부나 이혼한 여인에게 장가 들지 말고 오직 이스라엘 족속의 처녀나 혹시 제사장의 과부에게 장가 들 것이며

sentences.original_text: Neither shall they take for their wives a widow
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 과부를 아내로 맞이하지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: nor her that is put away
of the seed of the house of Israel
or a widow that had a priest before
